summary: TAKATA INFLATOR - THIS RECALL WAS ISSUED ON MAY 24TH, 2016.   I AM NOT SATISFIED THAT A SOLUTION IS NOT OFFERED AND NEW PARTS NOT INSTALLED.   WE USE THIS VEHICLE DAILY AND FOR MY CHILDREN TO STILL BE AT RISK OF INJURY OR EVEN DEATH APPALLS ME THAT THIS IS CLOSE TO A YEAR AND NO RESOLUTION.    I AM THANKFUL WE DID NOT HAVE AN ACCIDENT YET BUT THIS SHOULD NOT BE JUST A COMPLAINT FOR AFTER THE FACT.   WE NEED THIS RESOLVED BEFORE SOMEONE IS HURT OR KILLED AND AT THAT POINT A IT WONT JUST BE AN INFORMAL COMPLAINT BUT A FULL FLEDGED LAW SUIT.
